timeline.bodyText:
how about just

true if the protocol adapter should require clients to authenticate

The description already puts it into the right context, FMPOV

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/core/src/main/java/org/eclipse/hono/config/ProtocolAdapterProperties.java b/core/src/main/java/org/eclipse/hono/config/ProtocolAdapterProperties.java index 6e92e3633..f8477ea78 100644 --- a/core/src/main/java/org/eclipse/hono/config/ProtocolAdapterProperties.java +++ b/core/src/main/java/org/eclipse/hono/config/ProtocolAdapterProperties.java @@ -59,8 +59,7 @@ public class ProtocolAdapterProperties extends ServiceConfigProperties { *

* The default value of this property is {@code true}. * - * @param authenticationRequired {@code true} if the protocol adapter demands the authentication of devices to allow - * the publishing of data. + * @param authenticationRequired {@code true} if the protocol adapter should require clients to authenticate. */ public final void setAuthenticationRequired(final boolean authenticationRequired) { this.authenticationRequired = authenticationRequired;

timeline.message:
Fix JavaDoc of ProtocolAdapterProperties
